```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library(qcvid)

```

This package contains `data.table::fread` helpers, which specify the type of columns (Integer, Date, etc.) for the following tables: **SIP**, **PCV**, **CEX**, **MBDS**, **AED**, **DIAGNOSES**, **MDR**, **PMR** and **EOS**.

# SIP

```{r}
# read sip file--------------------------------------------------------------
tibble::tribble(
  ~variable_name, ~colClass,
  "sip",                  "character",
  "fecha_calculo",        "Date",
  "fecha_nacimiento",     "Date",
  "sexo",                 "character",
  "pais_nacimiento",      "character",
  "sit_empadronamiento",  "character",
  "derecho_farmacia",     "character",
  "dpto_salud",           "character",
  "zona_salud",           "character",
  "fecha_alta",           "Date",
  "fecha_baja",           "Date",
  "causa_baja",           "character",
  "fecha_defuncion",      "Date",
  "raf_ilimi",            "integer",
  "raf_ipago",            "character",
  "apsig",                "character"
) |> gt::gt(id = "sip") |>  # need to name the table to apply CSS
  gt::fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) |> 
  gt::tab_style(
      style = list(
      gt::cell_text(weight = "bold")
    ),
    locations = gt::cells_body(columns = variable_name)
  ) |> 
  gt::tab_style(
    style = list(
      gt::cell_fill(color = "#9473d8"),
      gt::cell_text(color = "white", align = "left", weight = "bold")
    ),
    locations = gt::cells_column_labels()) |> 
  gt::opt_row_striping( row_striping = TRUE) |>
   gt::tab_options(
    container.height = "300px"
  ) |>
  gt::opt_css(
    css = "
    #sip tr:hover {
    background-color: #f2cce4;
    }
    ")

```

<br>

h1, .h1, h2, .h2, h3, .h3 {

h1.title {
  font-size: 38px;

}
h4.author { /* Header 4 - and the author and data headers use this too  */
    font-size: 18px;
  font-family: "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
  color: DarkRed;
  text-align: center;
}
h4.date { /* Header 4 - and the author and data headers use this too  */
  font-size: 18px;
  font-family: "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
  color: DarkBlue;
  text-align: center;
}

.blackbox {
  padding: 1em;
  background: LightPink;
  color: black;
  border: 2px orange;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
.center {
  text-align: center;
}

/*----------LOGO above TOC---------*/

#TOC::before {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  height: 200px;
  margin: 10px 5px 10px 5px;
  background-image: url("../inst/extdata/logo.png");
  background-size: contain;
  background-position: center center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

body {
  text-align: justify;
}

.table caption{
  font-style: italic;
  color: black;
  text-align: left
}

div.figure {
  display: table;
  width: 100%;
  font-style: italic;
  color: black;
}
div.figure p {
  display: table-caption;
  caption-side: bottom;
}

.output {
max-height: 200px;
overflow-y: scroll;
}
